alert.note: Alert for New Madrid; Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:41AM CST until January 12 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN PULASKI...SOUTHERN ALEXANDER...SOUTHWESTERN BALLARD...NORTHERN MISSISSIPPI...EASTERN SCOTT AND NORTHEASTERN NEW MADRID COUNTIES... At 140 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Olive Branch to near Anniston, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Strong winds were reported in Sikeston as the storm moved through.l IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Tamms around 145 AM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Cairo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 14. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 2 and 21. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 74 and 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
